metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8825 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
A null dereference vulnerability has been found in the MIME handling component of LibEtPan before 1.8, as used in MailCore and MailCore 2. A crash can occur in low-level/imf/mailimf.c during a failed parse of a Cc header containing multiple e-mail addresses.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-8825` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libetpan20 - 1.8.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libetpan package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.0-1').
